query: CREATE TABLE TIMESTAMPTZ_TBL (d1 timestamp(2) with time zone)
SELECT count(*) AS One FROM TIMESTAMPTZ_TBL WHERE d1 = timestamp with time zone 'today'
expected: SELECT COUNT(*) AS one FROM timestamptz_tbl WHERE d1 = CAST('today' AS TIMESTAMPTZ)

query: SELECT count(*) AS One FROM TIMESTAMPTZ_TBL WHERE d1 = timestamp with time zone 'tomorrow'
expected: SELECT COUNT(*) AS one FROM timestamptz_tbl WHERE d1 = CAST('tomorrow' AS TIMESTAMPTZ)

query: SELECT count(*) AS One FROM TIMESTAMPTZ_TBL WHERE d1 = timestamp with time zone 'yesterday'
expected: SELECT COUNT(*) AS one FROM timestamptz_tbl WHERE d1 = CAST('yesterday' AS TIMESTAMPTZ)

query: SELECT count(*) AS One FROM TIMESTAMPTZ_TBL WHERE d1 = timestamp with time zone 'tomorrow EST'
expected: SELECT COUNT(*) AS one FROM timestamptz_tbl WHERE d1 = CAST('tomorrow EST' AS TIMESTAMPTZ)

query: SELECT count(*) AS One FROM TIMESTAMPTZ_TBL WHERE d1 = timestamp with time zone 'tomorrow zulu'
expected: SELECT COUNT(*) AS one FROM timestamptz_tbl WHERE d1 = CAST('tomorrow zulu' AS TIMESTAMPTZ)

query: SELECT count(*) AS two FROM TIMESTAMPTZ_TBL WHERE d1 = timestamp(2) with time zone 'now'
expected: SELECT COUNT(*) AS two FROM timestamptz_tbl WHERE d1 = CAST('now' AS TIMESTAMPTZ(2))

query: SELECT count(d1) AS three, count(DISTINCT d1) AS two FROM TIMESTAMPTZ_TBL
expected: SELECT COUNT(d1) AS three, COUNT(DISTINCT d1) AS two FROM timestamptz_tbl
TRUNCATE TABLE timestamptz_tbl CONTINUE IDENTITY RESTRICT
SELECT CAST('infinity' AS TIMESTAMPTZ) = CAST('+infinity' AS TIMESTAMPTZ) AS t

query: SELECT str, interval, date_trunc(str, ts, 'Australia/Sydney') = date_bin(interval::interval, ts, timestamp with time zone '2001-01-01+11') AS equal FROM ( VALUES ('day', '1 d'), ('hour', '1 h'), ('minute', '1 m'), ('second', '1 s'), ('millisecond', '1 ms'), ('microsecond', '1 us') ) intervals (str, interval), (VALUES (timestamptz '2020-02-29 15:44:17.71393+00')) ts (ts)
expected: SELECT str, interval, date_trunc(str, ts, 'Australia/Sydney') = date_bin(CAST(interval AS INTERVAL), ts, CAST('2001-01-01+11' AS TIMESTAMPTZ)) AS equal FROM (VALUES ('day', '1 d'), ('hour', '1 h'), ('minute', '1 m'), ('second', '1 s'), ('millisecond', '1 ms'), ('microsecond', '1 us')) AS intervals(str, interval), (VALUES (CAST('2020-02-29 15:44:17.71393+00' AS TIMESTAMPTZ))) AS ts(ts)

query: SELECT interval, ts, origin, date_bin(interval::interval, ts, origin) FROM ( VALUES ('15 days'), ('2 hours'), ('1 hour 30 minutes'), ('15 minutes'), ('10 seconds'), ('100 milliseconds'), ('250 microseconds') ) intervals (interval), (VALUES (timestamptz '2020-02-11 15:44:17.71393')) ts (ts), (VALUES (timestamptz '2001-01-01')) origin (origin)
expected: SELECT interval, ts, origin, date_bin(CAST(interval AS INTERVAL), ts, origin) FROM (VALUES ('15 days'), ('2 hours'), ('1 hour 30 minutes'), ('15 minutes'), ('10 seconds'), ('100 milliseconds'), ('250 microseconds')) AS intervals(interval), (VALUES (CAST('2020-02-11 15:44:17.71393' AS TIMESTAMPTZ))) AS ts(ts), (VALUES (CAST('2001-01-01' AS TIMESTAMPTZ))) AS origin(origin)

query: SELECT d1 as timestamptz, date_part( 'year', d1) AS year, date_part( 'month', d1) AS month, date_part( 'day', d1) AS day, date_part( 'hour', d1) AS hour, date_part( 'minute', d1) AS minute, date_part( 'second', d1) AS second FROM TIMESTAMPTZ_TBL
expected: SELECT d1 AS timestamptz, date_part('year', d1) AS year, date_part('month', d1) AS month, date_part('day', d1) AS day, date_part('hour', d1) AS hour, date_part('minute', d1) AS minute, date_part('second', d1) AS second FROM timestamptz_tbl

query: SELECT d1 as timestamptz, date_part( 'quarter', d1) AS quarter, date_part( 'msec', d1) AS msec, date_part( 'usec', d1) AS usec FROM TIMESTAMPTZ_TBL
expected: SELECT d1 AS timestamptz, date_part('quarter', d1) AS quarter, date_part('msec', d1) AS msec, date_part('usec', d1) AS usec FROM timestamptz_tbl

query: SELECT d1 as timestamptz, date_part( 'isoyear', d1) AS isoyear, date_part( 'week', d1) AS week, date_part( 'isodow', d1) AS isodow, date_part( 'dow', d1) AS dow, date_part( 'doy', d1) AS doy FROM TIMESTAMPTZ_TBL
expected: SELECT d1 AS timestamptz, date_part('isoyear', d1) AS isoyear, date_part('week', d1) AS week, date_part('isodow', d1) AS isodow, date_part('dow', d1) AS dow, date_part('doy', d1) AS doy FROM timestamptz_tbl

query: SELECT d1 as timestamptz, date_part( 'decade', d1) AS decade, date_part( 'century', d1) AS century, date_part( 'millennium', d1) AS millennium, round(date_part( 'julian', d1)) AS julian, date_part( 'epoch', d1) AS epoch FROM TIMESTAMPTZ_TBL
expected: SELECT d1 AS timestamptz, date_part('decade', d1) AS decade, date_part('century', d1) AS century, date_part('millennium', d1) AS millennium, round(date_part('julian', d1)) AS julian, date_part('epoch', d1) AS epoch FROM timestamptz_tbl

query: SELECT d1 as timestamptz, date_part( 'timezone', d1) AS timezone, date_part( 'timezone_hour', d1) AS timezone_hour, date_part( 'timezone_minute', d1) AS timezone_minute FROM TIMESTAMPTZ_TBL
expected: SELECT d1 AS timestamptz, date_part('timezone', d1) AS timezone, date_part('timezone_hour', d1) AS timezone_hour, date_part('timezone_minute', d1) AS timezone_minute FROM timestamptz_tbl

query: SELECT d1 as "timestamp", extract(microseconds from d1) AS microseconds, extract(milliseconds from d1) AS milliseconds, extract(seconds from d1) AS seconds, round(extract(julian from d1)) AS julian, extract(epoch from d1) AS epoch FROM TIMESTAMPTZ_TBL
expected: SELECT d1 AS timestamp, extract(microseconds FROM d1) AS microseconds, extract(milliseconds FROM d1) AS milliseconds, extract(seconds FROM d1) AS seconds, round(extract(julian FROM d1)) AS julian, extract(epoch FROM d1) AS epoch FROM timestamptz_tbl
SELECT extract(epoch FROM CAST('294270-01-01 00:00:00+00' AS TIMESTAMPTZ))
SELECT extract(epoch FROM CAST('5000-01-01 00:00:00+00' AS TIMESTAMPTZ))

query: VALUES (CAST('1978-07-07 19:38 America/New_York' AS TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE) AT LOCAL)

CREATE VIEW timestamp_local_view AS SELECT CAST('1978-07-07 19:38 America/New_York' AS TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE) AT LOCAL AS ttz_at_local, timezone(CAST('1978-07-07 19:38 America/New_York' AS TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE)) AS ttz_func, TIMESTAMP '1978-07-07 19:38' AT LOCAL AS t_at_local, timezone(TIMESTAMP '1978-07-07 19:38') AS t_func
expected: CREATE VIEW timestamp_local_view AS SELECT timezone(CAST('1978-07-07 19:38 America/New_York' AS TIMESTAMPTZ)) AS ttz_at_local, timezone(CAST('1978-07-07 19:38 America/New_York' AS TIMESTAMPTZ)) AS ttz_func, timezone(CAST('1978-07-07 19:38' AS TIMESTAMP)) AS t_at_local, timezone(CAST('1978-07-07 19:38' AS TIMESTAMP)) AS t_func
